item.title: Well, that worked!
item.description: So the site is live! I will admit, I am not particularly savvy when it comes to JavaScript frameworks. I am primarily a C# developer yet here we are. So, let me introduce myself. I’m Jordan, an automation test engineer based in Melbourne, Victoria.
item.content:
So the site is live!

I will admit, I am not particularly savvy when it comes to JavaScript frameworks. I am primarily a C# developer yet here we are.

So, let me introduce myself. I’m Jordan, an automation test engineer based in Melbourne, Victoria.
